short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SnapNote is an open-source note-taking extension created with the goals of transparency, convenience, and most importantly, speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SnapNote simplifies web note-taking, allowing you to jot down thoughts instantly in your browser. Designed for efficiency, it's perfect for those quick notes when opening dedicated apps feels cumbersome.

Key Features:
- Export and Copy Options: Seamlessly export notes to Markdown, or copy them to the clipboard for easy sharing.
- Notion-Like Feel: Enjoy an intuitive interface reminiscent of Notion, enhancing your note-taking experience.

SnapNote is open-source, inviting you to explore and contribute on https://github.com/fred-gutierrez/snapnote/.

Thanks for your interest in this project, we hope you enjoy taking notes with SnapNote!
